title: #8: Coronavirus Panic
description:
Did it come from bat soup, or was it a bioweapon unleashed on humanity in order to thin the herd? At this point, everything is on the table.

In October of 2019 in New York City, the Gates Foundation along with high-ranking government and military officials ran a simulation of what would happen if a deadly virus spread around the world. They predicted that it would start slowly, spread quickly, and shut down transportation and economies all over the world for 18 months while killing 65 million people.

Which virus did they use in their “simulation”? The Coronavirus, of course. Nothing to see here, just another real-world event that is playing out like the Globalists predicted just 90 days earlier.

Let’s dig into what the facts are, what is fiction, who is really behind this, what the media’s role in this operation is, and where this thing is actually heading.
